title: How to Export Contacts from Yahoo

steps.title: Go to https://mail.yahoo.com in any web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://mail.yahoo.com in any web browser. You can use any desktop web browser to follow these steps to export your Yahoo contacts.

steps.title: Sign in (if prompted).
steps.content: Sign in (if prompted). Enter your Yahoo ID and password, then click the “Sign In” button. You will be brought to your Inbox.

steps.title: Click the tab with the contacts card icon.
steps.content: Click the tab with the contacts card icon. It's usually on the right side of the central panel that displays your inbox next to a calendar icon. Clicking this will load your contacts in the panel on the right side of the page.

steps.title: Click ••• .
steps.content: Click ••• . You'll see the three-dot menu icon under the gear icon on the right side of the panel.

steps.title: Click Export to CSV file.
steps.content: Click Export to CSV file . This is usually near the bottom of the menu. You'll see a notification at the top of the browser window that the export will begin shortly.

steps.title: Choose a save location for the CSV file.
steps.content: Choose a save location for the CSV file. When your file manager pops-up, select a location in which you want to save your file and change the name of it, if you'd like. By default, the file name is "contacts.csv. [1] X Research source "
